title: core
description: Abstract set of properties applied to all top-level objects.

type.description: The exact name of the class of top-level object being represented.

spec_version.description: The version of the CTI core specification that this object conforms to.

created_time.description: The time at which this object was created.

created_by_ref.description: The identifier of the identity (organization, person, etc.) that created this object.

object_marking_refs.description: A list of references to data-marking objects that apply to this object.

granular_markings.description: A list of granular markings that apply to this object.
